from_our_farms: From Our Farms to Your Table
from_our_farms_desc: At ARIB DAIRY, our journey begins on lush, green farms where happy cows graze freely. We believe that the best dairy products come from the happiest, healthiest animals. Our commitment to quality starts at the source, ensuring every drop of milk is pure and wholesome.
quality_you_can_taste_desc: Our state-of-the-art facilities combine traditional methods with modern technology to process milk with the utmost care. We adhere to stringent quality controls, ensuring that every product, from fresh milk to creamy yogurt and rich cheese, meets the highest standards of taste and nutrition.
committed_to_community_desc: ARIB DAIRY is more than just a dairy company; we are a part of the community. We are dedicated to sustainable practices that protect our environment and support local farmers. Our mission is to provide nourishing dairy products while fostering a healthier planet for future generations.
gm_giplait_group: Mr. Mohamed Salah Boukhari - General Manager of Giplait Group
gm_arib_dairy: Mr. Mohamed Amine Boukhari - General Manager of ARIB Dairy
